channel.title: New serverhelp willl rep the cow that helps me :)
channel.description: Well I got bored of just *Joining* servers so I made my own based on tripscape added shops and I also added new start position and npc drops and shit but I wanna change the starting message is that in client.java? And how can I add more commands Do i use my command maker to make commands copy the command into client.java or make a new java file call it commands and shit?

item.title: New serverhelp willl rep the cow that helps me :)

item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

No problem.

item.dc:creator: @motoxnick motoxnick
item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

Yes that is it under that you should find something like.

[code][else if (command.startsWith(“male”))
{
sendMessage(“You’re now a man…”);
pHead=1;
pBeard=10;
pTorso=18;
pArms=26;
pHands=33;
pLegs=36;
pFeet=42;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}/code]

This is an example.[/code]

item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

I can’t help you on the command part but I can help you with the message. Hit CTRL + F type in the message that is on the server and it should come up and there you can change it. Then just complie and there ya go.
